objects.name: NewObject
objects.string:
Use the "Arrow Keys" to move.
Press "Space" to create a bomb

events.comment:
I do not own the assets used in this example; it is available and completely
free at https://opengameart.org/content/bomb-party-the-complete-set
Credits to: Cem Kalyoncu/cemkalyoncu (for the modified version of the spritesheet) and
to Matt Hackett/richtaur (for the original version of the spritesheet)
Check if a key is pressed; add force / movement and change animation
Check if a key is released; return to idle state everytime
Check if bomb is finished with it's exploding animation; then will create the fire explosion effect

If the animation of the fire explosion is at #3 frame or near finished; it will create the explosion tails on all 4 directions; also will set the timer
duration of the fire explosion
Delete fire explotion once it is done
Check for collisions with the fire explosion tails and the crate
This separates the player away from the walls, crates and etc; this makes it un-passable or a solid object
